data.title: How To Download
data.content: You can download Jiomeet from google play, app store or similiar places. You can also download the JioMeet app on Windows, as well as Mac OS. IF you do not wish to download the app, then you can also access JioMeet on supported browsers like Google Chrome and Firefox through their website.

data.title: Creating an account
data.content:
If you've already downloaded the app, then launch the app first. 
On the home-screen, tap Sign Up > enter your name and email/ mobile number > select agree to the company's terms and conditions and tap Done.
On the next screen, you'll be required to enter an OTP recieved on your registered mobile number or you'll have to verify your email account by checking your mail if you chose to register via email.
Besides, you can also sign up for JioMeet through the web. Simply visit the website, jiomeetpro.jio.com/home on Google Chrome or Firefox. Once the site is opened, select Sign Up and repeat the earlier steps.
